action.action-desc: Mr. Burlison (for himself, Ms. Boebert, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Mr. Collins, Mr. Onder, Mr. Ogles, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Self, and Mr. Gosar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To abolish the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Abolish the ATF Act.

section.header: Abolishment of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives
section.text: The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives is hereby abolished.
